sen.j: 尼子娘（あまこのいらつめ、生没年不詳）は、筑紫宗像郡の豪族・胸形君徳善の娘。
sen.e: Amako no Iratsume (year of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of MUNAKATA no Kimi Tokuzen, a Gozoku (local ruling family) of Chikushi Munakata-gun County.
sen.cmt: 「尼子」の読みは、原文のカッコ内に従い「Amako」と致しました。「胸形君徳善」の読みは、下記サイトから引用いたしました。http://d-munahaku.com/history/jinbutu/jinbutu_index.html
sen.e: Amako no Iratsume (year of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of MUNAKATA no Kimi Tokuzen, a Gozoku (local ruling family) of Chikushi Munakata-gun County.
Amako no Iratsume (year of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of MUNAKATA no Kimi Tokuzen, a Gozoku (local ruling family) of Chikushi Munakata-gun County.
She was a Hin (an imperial wife of the lowest rank) of Emperor Tenmu.
She was a Hin (an imperial wife of the lowest rank) of Emperor Tenmu.
She was a Hin (an imperial wife of the lowest rank) of Emperor Tenmu.
She was mother of Prince Takechi (Takechi no Miko).
She was the mother of Prince Takechi (Takechi no Miko).
She was the mother of Prince Takechi (Takechi no Miko).

sen.cmt: 「庄子」の読みは、用語集、サイトにも見つからず、推測です。
